This paper was proceeded by reports at the Joint Annual Conference of the Association for Computers and the Humanities and the Association for Literary and Linguistic Computing in 1999 (Charlottesville, Virginia) and Extreme Markup Languages 2000 (Montreal, Canada)
This paper was presented in a session entitled "Electronic Document Technology."
